author: tersec
content:
got
```
time="2024-12-10 09:43:12" level=info msg="Begin building block" prefix="rpc/validator" sinceSlotStartTime=15.158502ms slot=250116
time="2024-12-10 09:43:13" level=info msg="Finished building block" prefix="rpc/validator" sinceSlotStartTime=1.018653293s slot=250116 validator=24770
time="2024-12-10 09:43:13" level=error msg="Could not get last block by latest valid time" error="Post "http://snooper-engine:8561": context canceled" prefix="rpc/validator"
time="2024-12-10 09:43:13" level=warning msg="Beacon Node is no longer connected to an ETH1 chain, so ETH1 data votes are now random." prefix="rpc/validator"
time="2024-12-10 09:43:13" level=error msg="Could not pack deposits and attestations" error="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not get ETH1 deposits: could not fetch eth1data height: could not query block with given hash: Post "http://snooper-engine:8561": context canceled" prefix="rpc/validator"
```
from Prysm on the prysm-nimbusel node. Any idea why it would finish the block, then error?
